professional_summary: Oracle Database Administrator with 4+ years of experience in installing, maintaining, and configuring critical databases on Unix/Linux, Sun Solaris. Expertise in Oracle 10g, 11g, 12c databases, Data Guard setup, RMAN, ASM, and performance tuning. Proficient in creating users, roles, profiles, and managing backups, recovery, and database operations.

key_responsibilities: Installation and maintenance of critical databases on Unix/Linux
Responsible for installing Oracle 11g and 12c in Single Node & Multi-node configurations.
